name: Codename "Project Johnnyboy"
description:
You open your eyes, but the surrounding world is pitch black. After a moment you manage to make out some faint shades of a room.

Now, where are you? What happened? And what's that voice that suddenly started talking? And why is it calling you "Johnnyboy"?

Enter the game to find out!

The gameplay is basically using the well-known FPS controls of WSAD to move around, Space key to jump, moving the mouse to look around.
You can go faster with the left Shift key.

Interact with R.

More options might appear during the game.

You can always drop out with Escape to quit.

Gamepads are also (supposed to be) supported.

Contributors:

Heckert ( Programming, Project page)

Darexi ( Programming Narration System )

KnightOw1 ( Design, 3D modelling)

Aby-artistik ( Design, 2D, 3D, github space )

Vincelee_Vynz ( Design, 3D modelling, level layout)

l0lvers ( Design, 2D, SFX, Music )

Redmono ( Design, 3D modelling  )

Built in a frenzy over 60 hours due to some mis-communication about the due day for submission. Most of that was used for building the environment assets and designing the level map. The actual gameplay that made it into the submission was done in the 5 hours before uploading it.
